text: Ahmet Mesut Y覺lmaz (6 November 1947 - 30 October 2020) a Turkish politician. He was the leader of the Motherland Party from 1991 to 2002. Three times, he was the Prime Minister of Turkey. His first two terms lasted just months (in 1991 and 1996), while the third ran from June 1997 to January 1999. Y覺lmaz died on 30 October 2020 from lung cancer at a hospital in Istanbul at the age of 72.Former Turkish PM Mesut Y覺lmaz dies aged 72 ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography at Motherland Party's website * Personal Website * Biography at biyografi.net (Turkish) Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Turkey Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Prime ministers of Turkey
title: Mesut Y覺lmaz
